attributes.action: Dangerous Dogs Act 1991 To Be Lifted Against All Banned Breeds!
attributes.additional_details: The DDK Dynasty, America is a worldwide Pitbull breeder of the largest Pitbulls In the world 180lb to be the biggest, not one bad review has come back to them. Why? Even though they are extremely powerful, due to the effective training and discipline they are moulded into the perfect protection and family dogs. If this ban can be lifted,it will not only be an eye opener, it will also open more job roles for dog trainers who train in this field like myself. It can also make communities feel safer
attributes.background: Under no circumstance should any specific breed of any type of animal be banned under any act because an animal is a clear reflection of its owner & regardless if you took a dog or a hamster, if you teach it do wrong or right, it will do as its trained. Its sort of like being racist but to dogs...
